entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 24.
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 24. UV index 9 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
